articles.title: Pep Guardiola has told Man City why they should back Liverpool FC in Champions League vs Real Madrid - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City players are on holiday or international duty as Liverpool FC prepare for the Champions League final vs Real Madrid in Paris.
